articles.author: Will Richards
articles.title: Grimes says she proposed the idea of Elon Musk's dick-measuring challenge - NME
articles.description: Grimes has revealed that she came up with the idea for a dick-measuring challenge that Elon Musk proposed with Mark Zuckerburg.
articles.content:
Grimes has revealed that she came up with the idea for a dick-measuring challenge that Elon Musk proposed with Mark Zuckerburg.
Last month, Musk challenged Zuckerberg, who has trained in jiu-jitsu, … [+1564 chars]
